name: Liver Lesion Template
description: Liver Lesion Template - most up to date version as of June 27, 2013

AllowedTerm.codeMeaning: lateral segment of left lobe of liver
anterior segment of right lobe of liver
posterior segment of right lobe of liver

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Margin Boundary: Circumscribed to Indistinct
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Choose category and also quantify from well defined (1) to ill defined (100)

AllowedTerm.codeMeaning: neither well nor ill defined margin

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Margin Contours: Smooth to Irregular
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Choose category and also quantify from smooth (1) to irregular (100)

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Average Lesion Density: Hypo to Hyperdense
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Estimate net density given all components of the lesion

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Enhancement Uniformity
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Only if enhancing, is the enhancement homogeneous or heterogeneous

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Specific Enhancement Pattern(s)
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Choose up to three enhancemetn features

AllowedTerm.codeMeaning: geographic alteration; i.e. focal fat, infarct, hypertrophy
